item.description:
Water's Edge is having their 9th annual Fireworks Celebration...and YOU are invited. What a great way to spend an evening! Al Fresco dining at the Sunset Bar & Grill...Live Entertainment starting @ 5pm...Fireworks at Dusk...and a scrumptious buffet dinner is offered.

 

There is a dinner buffet but most of us will be grabbing a bite at The Sunset Grille Outdoor Bar.

Dinner Buffet ~ $29.00++ per person

So come enjoy the evening with your friends...or meet new ones!!!

(Above Pricing Does Not Reflect Tax & Service Charge

You can do the buffet but you will have to call the resort and pay for it online in advance. Dinner Buffet ~ $29.00++ per person.

You can bring snacks to share but please be discreet about it. NO COOLERS, PLEASE.

I am going to go early and try to snag seating at the white wrought iron gazebo. It was the best spot in the place last year, and we had it! I'm hoping to pull it off again. Look for the red balloons. If you need to contact me, my cell is 203-808-5829. If anyone would like to go early and help me hold space, I am going to be there for 4pm!

SAVE THE DATE!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the RED balloons!!! Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: 9th Annual Waters Edge Fireworks Display!!!
